name: Snake Dance (BigFumas)
description:
In this little game, you have to avoid the snakes and get as many coins as you can, be careful that with time the snakes will fall faster, so have fun . The game also has a highscore table.

Commands:

Arrows = move the character

Game made in clickteam fusion 2.5

If you liked the game consider making a donation, any amount is welcome, follow me and I will post more games soon
